description.value:
You focus on the target, gathering data as magical holograms display information. When the casting is complete, you learn biometric information about the target, including its fingerprints, medical conditions, and other basic physiological information. You or anyone you advise about the analysis gains a +1 status bonus to Impersonate the creature, on Medicine checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds}, and to Recall Knowledge actions about the creature. If the creature is illusory or under the effects of illusion magic, you detect this only if the effect's rank is lower than the spell rank of your analyze target spell.

Heightened (3rd) The circumstance bonus increases to +2 and you can target up to 10 creatures.

Heightened (6th) The circumstance bonus increases to +3 and you can target any number of creatures.
